mapper.select: select date_format(mytime,'%Y-%m-%d') as time,count(*) as num from (select * from time_info where date_format(mytime,'%H:%i:%S')>=#{time1}and #{time2}>=date_format(mytime,'%H:%i:%S') order by mytime ASC) as temp where mac_address in (select mac_address from address_info where city=#{city}) and (mytime between #{date1} and #{date2}) group by time order by time
